DOC.brief_summary: A RCT study compare traditional colporrhaphy versus polypropylene mesh treatment anterior vaginal wall prolapse .
DOC.brief_title: Surgical Treatment To Greater Anterior Vaginal Prolapse
DOC.detailed_description: Seventy patient great anterior vaginal prolapse , whit stress incontinence , randomly assign either colporrhaphy polypropylene mesh repair ( NAZCA TC™ POP REPAIR SYSTEM ) . The primary outcome recurrent anterior vaginal prolapse , secondary outcome effect quality life sexual symptom score , operative time , length hospitalization , adverse event .
DOC.criteria: Women 50 year old great anterior vaginal prolapse , whit stress incontinence , point ( Ba ) ics96 , hymenal ring require surgical correction eligible participation . Patients exclude : Stage 0 I ( ics96 ) anterior vaginal support Declined participation Were pregnant contemplate future pregnancy Had prior anterior vaginal prolapse repair biologic synthetic graft Active latent systemic infection Compromised immune system Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus , Previous pelvic irradiation cancer Known hypersensitivity polypropylene .
